original_title: Grateful Dead: Truckin Up to Buffalo
overview: Grateful Dead live concert footage from July 4, 1989. Set list includes:  Set 1:  Bertha->  The Greatest Story Ever Told  Cold Rain And Snow  Walkin' Blues  Row Jimmy  When I Paint My Masterpiece  Stagger Lee  Looks Like Rain->  Deal  Set 2:  Touch Of Grey->  Man Smart Woman Smarter  Ship Of Fools->  Playin' In The Band Reprise->  Terrapin Station->  Drums->  I Will Take You Home->  All Along The Watchtower->  Morning Dew->  Not Fade Away  Encore:  U.S. Blues  The Band:  Jerry Garcia  Mickey Hart  Bill Kreutzmann  Phil Lesh  Brent Mydland  Bob Weir
title: Grateful Dead: Truckin Up to Buffalo
